title: ICE in rustdoc: `internal error: entered unreachable code`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```rust //! docs //! See [`S`]. mod mymodule { mod experiment { #![cfg(feature = "unstable-stuff")] pub struct S; } #[cfg(feature = "unstable-stuff")] pub use inner::S; } pub use mymodule::*; #[cfg(doc)] use mymodule::S; ``` ### Meta Happens with `1.65.0-nightly (2befdefdd 2022-08-06)` and stable `1.62.1 (e092d0b6b 2022-07-16)`. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (2befdefdd 2022-08-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2befdefdda0f2bc5ff93f7f95633c98841409098 commit-date: 2022-08-06 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'internal error: entered unreachable code', compiler/rustc_resolve/src/lib.rs:1920:67 [...] error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic ```
Backtrace

``` 0: 0x7fa5b089dfbd - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h8e036432725b1c57 at /rustc/e092d0b6b43f2de967af0887873151bb1c0b18d3/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fa5b089dfbd -
